A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I encourage anyone who liked this movie to go watch it again. I'm no Star Wars fan\, and I didn't have high expectations. I just wanted to enjoy a movie with my wife. However\, I honestly felt like the first hour or so I was watching a parody of a Star Wars movie. The ending of the movie on planet Crait was entertaining\, but overall the plot holes\, bad directing\, worse acting and \"aha\" moments that were diminished because they were already \"aha\" moments in Force Awakens\, were too much to overcome. Honestly\, Leia's Superman impression to a window with everyone waiting for her almost caused me to leave the theater.
